## Carga de datos

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

---

```{r}
load("datos/accidentes2020_data.rda")

accidentes_tb <- 
  accidentes2020_data |> 
  as_tibble()
```

---
## Resumen

```{r}
resumen <- accidentes_tb |> 
  count(sexo)
```

---
## Visualizaci√≥n

```{r}
ggplot(resumen) +
  geom_col(aes(x = sexo, y = n, fill = sexo), alpha = 0.6) +
  theme_minimal()
```
